utils.enhanced_config_manager module

Enhanced Configuration Manager - AI PPT Assistant Supports both YAML configuration files and environment variables Provides seamless migration path from env vars to config files

class utils.enhanced_config_manager.EnhancedConfigManager(environment='dev', config_dir=None)[源代码]

基类：object

Enhanced Configuration Manager supporting YAML files and environment variables

Features: - YAML configuration file support with environment-specific overrides - Backward compatibility with environment variables - SSM Parameter Store and Secrets Manager integration - Variable interpolation (${ENV:VAR}, ${SSM:path}, ${SECRET:name}) - Configuration validation and type conversion - Caching for performance

__init__(environment='dev', config_dir=None)[源代码]
get_value(path, default=None, fallback_env_var=None)[源代码]

Get configuration value by dot-notation path

参数:

  • path (str) -- Dot-notation path (e.g., 'aws.region', 'services.s3.bucket')

  • default (Any) -- Default value if not found

  • fallback_env_var (Optional[str]) -- Environment variable to check if config value not found

返回类型:

Any

返回:

Configuration value or default
